publications.title: LTX-2: Efficient Joint Audio-Visual Foundation Model
publications.summary: An open-source 19B-parameter model for generating high-quality, temporally synchronized audiovisual content. Features an asymmetric dual-stream transformer with bidirectional audio-video cross-attention, achieving state-of-the-art quality among open-source systems.
publications.authors: Yoav HaCohen, Benny Brazowski, Nisan Chiprut, ..., **Nir Zabari**, et al.

publications.title: LTX-Video: Real-Time Video Latent Diffusion
publications.summary: LTX-Video is a transformer-based latent diffusion model for real-time video generation, producing 5 seconds of 24 fps video at 768x512 resolution in 2 seconds on an Nvidia H100 GPU.
publications.authors: Yoav HaCohen, Nisan Chiprut, Benny Brazowski, Daniel Shalem, Dudu Moshe, Eitan Richardson, Eran Levin, Guy Shiran, **Nir Zabari**, Ori Gordon, Poriya Panet, Sapir Weissbuch, Victor Kulikov, Yaki Bitterman, Zeev Melumian, Ofir Bibi

publications.title: Diffusing Colors: Image Colorization with Text-Guided Diffusion

publications.authors: **Nir Zabari**, Aharon Azulay, Alexey Gorkor, Tavi Halperin, Ohad Fried
